content:
# The smelting process has produced 2 Iron Plates, and there are still 2 Iron Ore remaining in the furnace.
# My inventory now contains:
# - 1 Stone Furnace
# - 5 Coal
# - 5 Iron Ore
# - 3 Iron Plates
# - 2 Iron Gear Wheels

# To craft the Assembling Machine, I need:
# - 3 Iron Plates
# - 3 Iron Gear Wheels
# - 1 Electronic Circuit

# I currently have:
# - 3 Iron Plates (just enough)
# - 2 Iron Gear Wheels (I need one more)

# I will now craft one more Iron Gear Wheel using the available Iron Plates.
craft_item(Prototype.IronGearWheel, quantity=1)  # Craft one more Iron Gear Wheel.
print(f'Updated Inventory after crafting third gear wheel: {inspect_inventory()}')  # Check the inventory after crafting.
